snippet: The fatal shooting of an unarmed black teenager Saturday by a police officer in a St. Louis suburb was met with outrage and skepticism in the largely African-American community.
abstract: Thousands of people flood streets in Ferguson, Mo, to protest fatal shooting of unarmed black teenager Michael Brown by a police officer; police say they are sorting out exact details of the shooting, while medical examiner for St Louis County is investigating to determine how many times Brown was shot.

byline.original: By JULIE BOSMAN and EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS

lead_paragraph: The fatal shooting of an unarmed black teenager Saturday by a police officer in a St. Louis suburb was met with outrage and skepticism in the largely African-American community.

headline.seo: Police Say Mike Brown Was Killed After Struggle for Gun in St. Louis Suburb
headline.main: Grief and Protests Follow Shooting of a Teenager
headline.print_headline: Grief and Protests Follow Shooting of a Teenager

keywords.value: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People
keywords.name: organizations
